description: The operational meaning of a category of limits.

contents.name: OperationalLimitType_acceptableDuration
contents.description: The nominal acceptable duration of the limit.  Limits are commonly expressed in terms of the a time limit for which the limit is normally acceptable.   The actual acceptable duration of a specific limit may depend on other local factors such as temperature or wind speed.

contents.name: OperationalLimitType_limitType
contents.description: Types of limits defined in the ENTSO-E Operational Handbook Policy 3.
